tool_description: Flags reviews as potentially fake based on authenticity scores and configurable thresholds, with support for different flagging strategies.

review_ids.description: Array of review identifiers to evaluate

authenticity_scores.description: Corresponding authenticity scores for each review (0-100)

flagging_threshold.description: Threshold below which reviews are flagged (0-100)

action_type.description: Type of action to take (flag, hide, remove, review)

error_messages: Array length mismatch: review_ids and authenticity_scores arrays must have the same length
Empty input arrays: At least one review must be provided
Invalid authenticity scores: All scores must be between 0 and 100
Invalid flagging threshold: Threshold must be between 0 and 100
Invalid action type: Use one of [flag, hide, remove, review]
usage: Provide review_ids with corresponding authenticity_scores. Set flagging_threshold and action_type based on your platform's policy.

flagged_reviews.description: List of review IDs flagged as potentially fake

action_summary.description: Summary of actions taken on flagged reviews
